description:
Setsu and Levia set off for the Beastmen continent. On their way, they cross paths with Setsu`s old friend Alizee and discover she has been battling a mysterious dragon. Together, they unravel the shocking truth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Master and Pupil for a Second Time
Maître et disciple pour la deuxième fois
師弟関係は二度目です
